Sentencas: Oxy-apatites are one of the most promising oxide ion conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, those operating close to 950 K. La-9.33(SiO4)(6)O-2 has the simplest stoichiometry among the oxy-apatite family of compounds, and the range of oxide ion conductivity reported for dense ceramic pellets is very high, almost two orders of magnitude at a given temperature.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite

Sentencas: The spread in conductivity values including porous pellets is obviously larger.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite

Sentencas: Here, we show that dense pellets of La-9.33(SiO4)(6)O-2 ceramics prepared by three different methods, conventional, spark plasma, and reaction sintering (RS), have different bulk conductivities.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite

Sentencas: Bulk activation energies are equal for all the samples studied.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite

Sentencas: Furthermore, the grain boundary conductivity cannot be described by the simple brick-layer model.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite

Sentencas: These experimental findings suggest segregation at the grain boundary region, with slightly different compositions for different sintering conditions, likely leaving the grain interior with a compositional gradient.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite

Sentencas: A two-step RS led to dense pellets with the highest bulk and grain boundary oxide ion conductivities.
Titulo: Microstructure and Oxide Ion Conductivity in a Dense La9.33(SiO4)6O2 Oxy-Apatite
